channel.title: Security on Jake Van Alstyne
channel.description: Recent content in Security on Jake Van Alstyne

item.title: GPG & YubiKey & You
item.description: I’ve recently taken on the task of setting up my YubiKeys for usage beyond 2 factor auth. Something I learned was that OpenPGP smartcards (which include YubiKeys) have slots for three separate keys: Signature, Encryption, and Authentication. My first goal is to sign git commits with it. Because I am a man of negligible importance, this is in fact NOT an excercise in security. I’m taking more of a hobbyist approach.
